accept.title: Accept
accept.description: Specifies the types of files that the server accepts (only for type="file")

alt.title: Alt text
alt.description: Specifies an alternate text for images (only for type="image")

autocomplete.title: Autocomplete
autocomplete.description: Specifies whether an <input> element should have autocomplete enabled

autofocus.title: Autofocus
autofocus.description: Specifies that an <input> element should automatically get focus when the page loads

checked.title: Checked
checked.description: Specifies that an <input> element should be pre-selected when the page loads (for type="checkbox" or type="radio")

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: Specifies that an <input> element should be disabled

formaction.title: Form action
formaction.description: Specifies the URL of the file that will process the input control when the form is submitted (for type="submit" and type="image")

formenctype.title: Form encoding type
formenctype.description: Specifies how the form-data should be encoded when submitting it to the server (for type="submit" and type="image")

formmethod.title: Method
formmethod.description: Defines the HTTP method for sending data to the action URL (for type="submit" and type="image")

formnovalidate.title: Form no validate
formnovalidate.description: Defines that form elements should not be validated when submitted

formtarget.title: Form target
formtarget.description: Specifies where to display the response that is received after submitting the form

height.title: Height
height.description: Specifies the height of an <input> element (only for type="image")

list.title: Data list
list.description: Refers to a <datalist> element that contains pre-defined options for an <input> element

max.title: Max
max.description: Specifies the maximum value for an <input> element (can be a number or a date)

maxlength.title: Max length
maxlength.description: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in an <input> element

min.title: Min
min.description: Specifies a minimum value for an <input> element (can be a number or a date)

multiple.title: Multiple
multiple.description: Specifies that a user can enter more than one value in an <input> element

name.title: Name
name.description: Specifies the name of an <input> element

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: Specifies a regular expression that an <input> element's value is checked against

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.description: Specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of an <input> element

readonly.title: Read-only
readonly.description: Specifies that an input field is read-only

required.title: Required
required.description: Specifies that an input field must be filled out before submitting the form

size.title: Size
size.description: Specifies the width, in characters, of an <input> element

src.title: Src
src.description: Specifies the URL of the image to use as a submit button (only for type="image")

step.title: Step
step.description: Specifies the legal number intervals for an input field

type.title: Type
type.description: Specifies the type <input> element to display

value.title: Value
value.description: Specifies the value of an <input> element

width.title: Width
width.description: Specifies the width of an <input> element (only for type="image")
